name: @sogouda/app-bindings
description: A set of JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Sogouda App Framework

scripts.build: npm run build:native && npm run build:types && npm run build:api && npm run build:packages && npm run clean
scripts.build:packages: shx mkdir -p packages && npm run build:packages:app-bindings-types && npm run build:packages:app-bindings-native
scripts.build:packages:app-bindings-native: shx mkdir -p packages/app-bindings-native && node scripts/build/app-bindings-native.js && shx cp -r index.* packages/app-bindings-native && shx cp LICENSE packages/app-bindings-native/LICENSE && shx cp README.md packages/app-bindings-native/README.md
scripts.build:packages:app-bindings-types: shx mkdir -p packages/app-bindings-types && node scripts/build/app-bindings-types.js && shx cp -r index.d.ts* packages/app-bindings-types && shx echo "module.exports = {}" > packages/app-bindings-types/index.js && shx cp -r projects/app-bindings-types/* packages/app-bindings-types/
scripts.cleanall:deep: npm run cleanall:lite && shx rm -rf target/
scripts.cleanall:lite: npm run clean && shx rm -rf dist/ packages/
scripts.prepublish: npm run cleanall && npm run build
scripts.publish:projects: npm run publish:projects:app-bindings-native && npm run publish:projects:app-bindings-types
scripts.publish:projects:beta: npm run publish:projects:app-bindings-native:beta && npm run publish:projects:app-bindings-types:beta
scripts.publish:projects:rc: npm run publish:projects:app-bindings-native:rc && npm run publish:projects:app-bindings-types:rc
scripts.publish:release: npm run cleanall && npm run build && npm run publish:projects
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run cleanall && npm run build && npm run publish:projects:alpha
scripts.publish:beta: npm run cleanall && npm run build && npm run publish:projects:beta
scripts.publish:rc: npm run cleanall && npm run build && npm run publish:projects:rc
scripts.rebuild: npm run cleanall:lite && npm run build

author: Ashlynne Juniper
